article_title: Charitable Gifts From Wealthy Koch Brothers Often Prompt Partisan Reactions
article_text:
Rarely has so much well-intentioned money spurred so much controversy.

One $100 million gift, targeted to help build a new hospital facility, was later the focus of street protests. A $25 million donation funding scholarships for minority students prompted one Ivy League professor to urge the rejection of the "tainted" gift. And a $1 million grant to fund a business-school study provoked 50 prominent Catholic educators to...

twitter.description: Wealthy brothers Charles and David Koch are among the nation's most visible supporters of conservative political causes—a fact that, in many cases, has made their nonpolitical giving a lightning rod for partisan reaction.
twitter.creator: @MelanieGWest

image.alt: When a Donation Divides: Gifts from Charles and David Koch often prompt partisan reactions
